channel.title: Family Blood Crobar Chris Movies Matiss on Writing by Harper Reed

item.title: Kill Bill
item.description: Tonight chris, matiss and I went and saw kill bill. it was pretty funny. a LOT of blood. THey stylistic props QT gave to a lot of the traditional kung fu and samauri movies was impressive. the choreography was intense. soooo much blood. but it was good. this week is goign to be fun. I am bummed I have to miss the crobar opening.. chris and virgin tears are deejaying the vip room.
